response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This represents a considerable savings compared to the market value of $12,000, making it an excellent opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 11000}
